items.sentence: I can't help but think all of that was a waste of time.
I'm afraid you don't stand a chance of getting the job.
You're more beautiful now than the day I first met you.
I'm just trying to make some money to feed my children.
I'm going to subscribe to these chamber-music concerts.
My father often falls asleep while watching television.
Can you think of any reasons that we shouldn't do this?
I want to go on a diet, but I just can't stop snacking.
We need to study harder if we want to pass this course.
Tom told me he thinks that Mary is prettier than Alice.
I want to be able to play the saxophone as well as Tom.
It's a good habit to look up new words in a dictionary.
Tom is shorter and weighs significantly less than Mary.
I'm listening to a recording of your concert right now.
Tom couldn't help but tease Mary a little bit about it.
Tom spends at least three hours a day riding his horse.
I should've guessed that you were the one who did this.
Tom only does something if he feels confident about it.
Tom and Mary play tennis together several times a week.
Tom and I agreed that we'd never talk about that again.
